responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using React.js and Node.js.
Design and implement RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver scalable solutions.
Create and maintain database schemas using MongoDB and SQL-based databases.
Monitor application performance and troubleshoot any issues that arise.
Work closely with the DevOps team to integrate solutions within CI/CD pipelines.
Document software development processes, workflows, and technical specifications.
Continuously improve code quality, performance, and scalability by incorporating industry best practices.
Mentor junior developers on Full Stack technologies and best practices.
Ensure all web applications meet security, performance, and compliance standards.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in Full Stack web development.
Proficiency in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and Express.js.
Experience with RESTful API design and development.
Strong understanding of MongoDB and SQL-based databases.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and Agile methodologies.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
